properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 12:23PM EST until February 18 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations
of 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will produce
blowing and drifting snow for a brief time Tuesday morning
before temperatures warm above freezing.

* WHERE...Lewis county.

* WHEN...From 5 AM to 3 PM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions
could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited
visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving.

Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 3 PM EST TUESDAY
